message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $15000 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I can meet you in the middle at $17500. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $16500, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're in a stalemate, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I can do $16250, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a final price of $16000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $16250, Bob. I think we've been fair with each other so far. If you're not willing to meet me at $16250, I'm going to have to consider other options.
